lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Johnston said overall government spending of 10.42 billion dlrs represents a cut of 4.4 pct, but various grants and tax credits for agriculture and energy industries will remain.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The provincial government expects resource tax revenues for fiscal 1987 to fall to 1.30 billion dlrs from a previously estimated 2.20 billion dlrs, compared to 3.60 billion dlrs collected in fiscal 1986 before the collapse in oil prices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The budget forecasts the 1987-88 provincial deficit to be 1.90 billion dlrs, compared to a forecast deficit of 3.30 billion dlrs for fiscal 1987, which ends March 31, Johnston said.
